ai-tha-ap305:0.3_0: The Elder Nuns, having given a request for the Elder Nunnery
ai-tha-ap305:1.2_0: like a Udaya, after speaking kindly to the top,
ai-tha-ap305:2.1_0: raising his hands in respectful salutation,
ai-tha-ap305:2.2_0: and plunged into my own house.
ai-tha-ap305:2.3_0: Having given the Sambuddha, the Awakened One,
ai-tha-ap305:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap305:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Senior.
ai-tha-ap305:6.1_0: Third: Understanding (thinking): This is the third Elder
